ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m entirely unqualified to give you advice, but I would like to know why you feel Blackburrow is such a good dungeon for bards.  I ve found it to be
ygData.messageBody:
The bard formerly known as Tszaaz wrote:

> 10-12 Blackburrow
> (I know it inside out and it is a great dungeon for bards)
>
> 12-15 Kurns Tower
> (which means dropping lots of silver, but all those warriors
> are going to
> love being hasted)
>
> 15-20 Unrest
> (I never hunted there before as my previous computer couldn't
> handle it)
>
> 20-25 Lake of Ill Omen
> (I took Tszaaz from 25-30 there, it might get tedious, might not)
>
> I am not feeling particularly inspired by this list however.
> If anyone has
> suggestions for when, as a bard, to go where I would
> appreciate it.

I'm entirely unqualified to give you advice, but I would like to know why
you feel Blackburrow is such a good dungeon for bards. I've found it to be
lag-city (2 song max) and have not been able to successfully hunt there with
either my bard, shaman, wizard, or rogue. I understand it's a good spot for
a necro though. But then, what isn't?

Peace
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Ro/Commons/Thicket, Tunare
